content: *designed by katherine eng it s hard to believe that just one yarn is used for this multicolored crocheted wrap the yarn is dyed with extra-long color repeats to create its own stripes there is minimal finishing and you never have to change colors lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # justwrap skill level easy homespun® article #790 4 balls *shown in harvest* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 8 stitches = 4 10 cm row 1 3 = 2-1⁄2 6 5 cm special stitches single_crochet 2 together single_crochet decrease shell wrap is made of 2 halves worked off a center foundation chain worked in 2-row pattern repeat finish with 3-round edging
